mainText:
I just wanted to say that I give my condolences to Mr. Jobs' family and
friends.  The world has indeed lost a creative genius and global visionary.
 His memory and legacy will live on not only with his products but with the
lives he's touched and inspired.  While the world has lost an icon we can
find peace in the fact that it was changed for the better in the brief time
he was able to influence it.
author: Christopher
